headline: Ask HN: Can someone recommend a more stable alternative to GitHub Actions?
description:
One of the things that I love about Github Actions is the experience of having a single user experience for continuous integration and continuous deployment. Last year we switched to Github Actions because of Bitbucket Pipelines instability. Recently Github Actions has been an even worse experience than Bitbucket Pipelines was.

I was wondering if anyone had experience with stable hosted CI/CD offerings that might have a similar experience to Github Actions from a development standpoint with a lot more platform stability.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 谁能推荐一个比GitHub Actions更稳定的替代品？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 誰能推薦一個比GitHub Actions更穩定的替代品？
description_zh-Hans:
我喜欢Github Actions的一个原因是，在持续集成和持续部署方面有一个单一的用户体验。去年，由于Bitbucket Pipelines的不稳定性，我们改用了Github Actions。最近，Github Actions的体验比Bitbucket Pipelines还要糟糕。

我想知道是否有人对稳定的托管CI/CD产品有经验，从开发的角度来看，这些产品可能与Github Actions有类似的体验，而且平台稳定性更高。
description_zh-Hant:
我喜歡Github Actions的一個原因是，在持續集成和持續部署方面有一個單一的用戶體驗。去年，由於Bitbucket Pipelines的不穩定性，我們改用了Github Actions。最近，Github Actions的體驗比Bitbucket Pipelines還要糟糕。

我想知道是否有人對穩定的託管CI/CD產品有經驗，從開發的角度來看，這些產品可能與Github Actions有類似的體驗，而且平臺穩定性更高。
